Text:
you can watch this for free on demand at both g4 tech tv, elecplay.com, and reviews on the run.

usa and canada have different g4 websites so if you're in canada just go to elecplay or reviews on the run.  (g4tv.ca is useless.)  . you can watch ep daily rotr dialy, ep canada, everything victor lucas for FREE, no need to wait for seeds.
and you can watch past episodes too.
